revtext: The store is user friendly and Ayesha is very knowledgeable and friendly. She   gives you proper guidance. The whole setup makes you feel comfortable and   confident.
revreply: Thanks very much Malar for your review and kind words.   Indeed it is our philosophy to ensure that every client of ours is offered the   best advise and information.   We take our responsibility very seriously and ensure the same culture is passed   on to our staff.   We look forward to serving you again
